robsongo@... writes:

> Hi Peter,

Gordon, Pete und all,
According  to Inami Hakusui in his book " Nippon-to, the Japanese Sword " 
published in 1948 , the cost of sword polish done in  Japan " is about four 
dollars " < page 102  >.

So the cost of umegane cannot be that much more ( at that time, i.e. )?

Milt
